title: For you madam. [No. 67/08] = Pour vous madame
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. Sylvie Ducatez paints picutres and materials and makes all sorts of jewelry. 2. A collection of ready made clothing made from natural materials, leather and wool. 3. A sea-bream “a la plancha”. 4. Bruno Coquatrix has founded a new school for Music Hall.
